code: import axios from'axios';import{ORDERS_BASEURL,PAYMENTS_BASEURL,PRODUCTS_BASEURL,SHIPPING_BASEURL,USER_BASEURL}from"./BaseURLs";var API=axios.create();API.interceptors.request.use(function(req){var profile=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('profile'));var token=profile?profile.token:null;if(token)req.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);return req;});export var getProductsPerPage=function getProductsPerPage(page,category){return API.get("".concat(PRODUCTS_BASEURL,"?page=").concat(page).concat(category&&"&category=".concat(category)));};export var productsSearch=function productsSearch(search,page){return API.get("".concat(PRODUCTS_BASEURL,"/search?search=").concat(search,"&page=").concat(page));};export var getRecommendations=function getRecommendations(){return API.get("".concat(PRODUCTS_BASEURL,"/recommendations"));};export var postProduct=function postProduct(product){return API.post("".concat(PRODUCTS_BASEURL),product);};export var adminUpdateDatabase=function adminUpdateDatabase(csv,mode){return API.patch("".concat(PRODUCTS_BASEURL),{csv:csv,mode:mode});};export var validateCart=function validateCart(cart){return API.post("".concat(PRODUCTS_BASEURL,"/cart"),{cart:cart});};export var authLogin=function authLogin(email,password){return API.post("".concat(USER_BASEURL,"/login"),{email:email,password:password});};export var verify=function verify(){return API.post("".concat(USER_BASEURL,"/verify"));};export var userUpdateWishlist=function userUpdateWishlist(product_id){return API.patch("".concat(USER_BASEURL,"/wishlist"),{product_id:product_id});};export var getWishlist=function getWishlist(){return API.get("".concat(USER_BASEURL,"/wishlist"));};export var fetchShipments=function fetchShipments(page){return API.get("".concat(SHIPPING_BASEURL,"?page=").concat(page));};export var fetchShipment=function fetchShipment(id){return API.get("".concat(SHIPPING_BASEURL,"/").concat(id));};export var updateShipment=function updateShipment(id,status){return API.patch("".concat(SHIPPING_BASEURL,"/").concat(id),{status:status});};export var fetchOrders=function fetchOrders(page){return API.get("".concat(ORDERS_BASEURL,"?page=").concat(page));};export var fetchOrder=function fetchOrder(id){return API.get("".concat(ORDERS_BASEURL,"/").concat(id));};export var updateOrder=function updateOrder(id,status){return API.patch("".concat(ORDERS_BASEURL,"/").concat(id),{status:status});};export var processPayment=function processPayment(token,data){return API.post("".concat(PAYMENTS_BASEURL),{token:token,data:data});};
